title: Champion Reveal: Illaoi, the Kraken Priestess

embed.description: Most champions arm themselves with swords or guns or magic or whatever, but Illaoi's bringing a freakin' god to the Rift. One of the new breed of juggernauts, she's a slow but impactful solo laner in any game, with tentacles that offer huge zone control once they worm their way into a game.
